title: Looking for a little advice.
body:
In the past 48 hours, My teams in ranked have been littered with Boarderline Intentional feeding players, My game Knowledge and mechanics are low low silver, high bronze at least, But I cannot carry from behind(and Its not easy for me to carry with a lead) I was just wondering if anyone here would help me out a bit, not like coaching or anything Like that(unless you want to) but just like, Tips and stuff.

A big Issue I feel I have is the champions I like to play, I'm not very good at. For instance, I love playing Ryze, but I suck bad with him.

On the other hand, Iv got Tons of games with Shaco(I have Mained him since early last season), and I feel I do rather well when I play him, But there are times when I get ready to play and decide against playing him(Into Xin/YI/WW mostly)

But, Basically, I kind of just need like, A hand up I suppose, Should I just stick with Shaco and go full one-trick, or is that a horrible Idea?
